item.title: Repositioning, Biomechanics of the Hand, and the Handex
item.description: The Key Board All the literature on the ergonomics of keyboards focuses on the spacing between keys and the curvature of a row of keys.

item.title: Using a One-Handed Keyboard in Gaming and VR
item.description: Using a one-handed keydex during video game play or VR game play can offer several benefits, such as:
